hadiths.text: Narrated The uncle of AbuRafi ibn Amr al-Ghifari: I was a boy. I used to throw stones at the palm-trees of the Ansar. So I was brought to the Prophet (ﷺ) who said: O boy, why do you throw stones at the palm-trees? I said: eat (dates). He said: Do not throw stones at the palm trees, but eat what falls beneath them. He then wiped his head and said: O Allah, fill his belly

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ قَالَ إِنَّهُ يَأْكُلُ مِمَّا سَقَطَ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever Said That He Many Eat From What Has Fallen
